entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -27.4°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -27.4°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
